item.title: A Titan's Journey

item.title: Durian at sea
item.description: Week 15: Back to Basics. This art was lovingly created using: Clip Studio. Artist’s Notes Decide to try something new this week so i tried animation for the first time…yea…its hard ü•≤ Could only use 24 frames cause of clipstudio’s restriction. Does anyone have any recommendation for 2d animation software? üéûÔ∏è Social Media N/A. Other Edit this page on GitHub. Create a bug ticket for the developer.

item.title: Set Sail to find the legendary Mandrake farm <:OOOdrake:779973582298021890>
item.description: Week 11: Atmosphere Spectrum. This art was lovingly created using: Clip studio. Artist’s Notes Decided to utilize everything I‚Äôve learned in these past few months (perspective, anatomy, value, color etc.) Conclusion: this was a very humbling experience (I was a bit overwhelmed / kinda gave up on the ship towards the end) xD ‚Äì I will keep practicing ‚úçÔ∏è Social Media N/A. item.title: Sleepless Night
item.description: Week 4: Murky Silhouettes. This art was lovingly created using: ClipStudio. Artist’s Notes Didn‚Äôt use one color but I tried to stick with cold colors? Worked on value and tones? Is floating considered rhythm and movement? (Honestly idk, still new to all these art vocabulary xD). i hope this respect the rules of the challenge <:PepeHands:779990751429918720> Implemented some contrast and circle shape from week 3 challenge so I don‚Äôt forget the notions I‚Äôve learned.
